Name: Travel Riddles: Trip To France
About the game: Have a fantastic trip to one of the most beautiful countries. Travel to France and unlock its secrets through a series of puzzles set in the capital city of Paris, amazing landscapes of Champagne and Provence, Courchevel ski resort and the jewel of French Riviera – Cannes. Earn dozens of achievements, get free gold to charge the powerups, blast through challenging levels and set the best score. Learn fun facts about past and present of France on every level and collect tons of artifacts and souvenirs! • Uncover more than 100 artifacts • Learn the secrets of France through more than 230 levels. • Beautiful locations • 9 unique episodes, from the capital city of Paris to Provence, Cannes and more. • Set of jigsaw puzzles Your journey around the world continues! Where will your travels take you next?
